transforms.name: vite:vue
vite:css
transforms.result: .body{font-family:Gentium Basic,serif}.section-header h1{color:#846644;font-size:30px;font-weight:500;padding-bottom:15px;position:relative;text-align:center}.section-header h1:before{background:#ddd;bottom:1px;content:"";display:block;height:1px;left:calc(50% - 60px);position:absolute;width:120px}.section-header h1:after{background:#3f230b;bottom:0;content:"";display:block;height:3px;left:calc(50% - 20px);position:absolute;width:40px}.title{border-bottom:.0625rem solid #d9d9d9;padding:0 1.25rem .9375rem;position:relative}.title strong{font-size:1.125rem;line-height:1.5rem;margin-bottom:.5rem;padding-top:.25rem}.title strong h1{font-size:1.75rem;font-weight:600;letter-spacing:.03125rem;line-height:2rem}.card{border-radius:0}.btn-brown{background:#3f230b;color:#fff}.form-check{margin-bottom:0;min-height:auto}.form-check-input{-webkit-appearance:none;-moz-appearance:none;appearance:none;background-color:#fff;background-position:50%;background-repeat:no-repeat;background-size:contain;border:.125rem solid #3f230b;border:1px solid #3f230b;height:1.125rem;height:1em;margin-top:.3em;position:relative;transition:background-color .15s ease-in-out,background-position .15s ease-in-out,border-color .15s ease-in-out,box-shadow .15s ease-in-out;vertical-align:top;width:1.125rem;width:1em}.form-check-input[type=checkbox]:checked{background-color:#3f230b}.form-check-input[type=checkbox]:focus{border-color:#3f230b}.form-check-input[type=checkbox]{border-radius:.125rem}.form-check .form-check-input{margin-left:-1.79rem}.form-check-input[type=checkbox]{border-radius:.25em}.form-check .form-check-input{float:left;margin-left:-1.5em}.fileterMobileHeader,.filter_button{display:none}@media screen and (max-device-width:640px){.filters{display:none}.filter_button{display:block}.filterContents{margin-top:40px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-top:15px}.card{border:0}.title{border-bottom:0;padding-left:0;padding-right:0}.mobile_view{background-color:#fff;display:block;height:100%;position:fixed;width:100%}.filter_close{background-color:#e2e1e1;box-shadow:0 2px px rgba(0,0,0,.18);box-sizing:border-box;font-size:1.25rem;left:0;padding:.625rem 1.25rem;position:absolute;top:0!important;width:100%;z-index:200}.filters-active-mobile{background:#fff;height:100%;margin-top:0;overflow:scroll;position:fixed;top:0;width:100%;z-index:10000}.wrapper{height:100vh;width:100vw}.fileterMobileHeader{background-color:#ddd;box-shadow:3px 3px 6px #000;display:block;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%}.mobile_filter_header{align-items:center;display:flex;font-size:25px;justify-content:space-between}}.btn-primary{--bs-btn-color:#fff;--bs-btn-bg:#3f230b;--bs-btn-border-color:#3f230b;--bs-btn-hover-color:#fff;--bs-btn-hover-bg:#846644;--bs-btn-hover-border-color:#846644;--bs-btn-focus-shadow-rgb:49,132,253;--bs-btn-active-color:#fff;--bs-btn-active-bg:#846644;--bs-btn-active-border-color:#846644;--bs-btn-active-shadow:inset 0 3px 5px rgba(0,0,0,.125);--bs-btn-disabled-color:#fff;--bs-btn-disabled-bg:#3f230b;--bs-btn-disabled-border-color:#3f230b}.btn:hover{background-color:#3f230b;border-color:#3f230b;color:var(--bs-btn-hover-color)}.our-color{color:#3f230b}
